text: The following television stations in the United States brand as channel 2 (though neither using virtual channel 2 nor broadcasting on physical RF channel 2): * KALB-DT2 in Alexandria, Louisiana * KDLH in Duluth, Minnesota * KMBH-LD in McAllen, Texas * KPSP-CD in Cathedral City, California * KYUU-LD in Boise, Idaho * WBBH-TV in Fort Myers, Florida * WENY-DT3 in Elmira, New York * WTOK-DT2 in Meridian, Mississippi The following television stations in the United States formerly branded as channel 2: * KDLH-DT2 in Duluth, Minnesota * KRII-DT2 in Chisholm, Minnesota 02 branded
title: Channel 2 branded TV stations in the United States
